title: Aussies reveal the travel companion from hell
text:
What are these? You want us to travel with them?! Source: Getty Images 
IF AUSSIES had their way, they’d like to crown their holidays off with the addition of a royal guest. 
It turns out Prince Harry has been named the ideal travel companion in a recent poll conducted on behalf of HotelClub.com. Coming in second is the prince’s sister-in-law Kate Middleton, with actress/UN ambassador Angelina Jolie third. 
Jolie’s husband, Brad Pitt, didn’t fare as well as his wife, sharing eighth spot with Leonardo DiCaprio. 
It also seems Aussies would like to be serenaded while on holidays, with pop stars Taylor Swift, Katy Perry, Ed Sheeran and Mariah Carey all making the top 10. 
When it comes to local stars, all-singing/all-dancing/all-acting Hugh Jackman takes out the top spot of ideal Australian travel companions. 
But Aussies want their funny bone tickled while travelling the world, with comedy actress Rebel Wilson their second most desired Aussie travel companion. 
As for the person they would least like to have with them, that crown goes to Justin Bieber, with Kim Kardashian and her husband Kanye West in a close second and third place. 
Some stars, including Mariah Carey and Brad Pitt, made it on to both lists, as did the most popular, Prince Harry. 
But locally the man who has frequently makes it to the top of the least popular lists, Kyle Sandilands, was also the Aussie most people wanted to leave at home. Why wouldn’t you want to bring me with you? Source: Channel 7 
World’s 10 best travel companions: 
1. Prince Harry — 15.2 per cent 
2. Kate Middleton — 10.8 per cent 
3. Angelina Jolie — 10.2 per cent 
4. Taylor Swift — 8.9 per cent 
5. Katy Perry — 8 per cent 
6. Ed Sheeran — 6.9 per cent 
7. Jennifer Lawrence — 6 per cent 
8. Brad Pitt — 4.9 per cent and Leonardo DiCaprio — 4.9 per cent 
9. Channing Tatum — 3.9 per cent 
10. Mariah Carey — 2.9 per cent 
Best Aussie travel companions: 
1. Hugh Jackman — 17.9 per cent 
2. Rebel Wilson — 6.1 per cent 
3. Kylie Minogue — 5.8 per cent 
4. Hamish Blake — 5.4 per cent 
5. Cate Blanchett — 4.9 per cent 
World’s worst travel companions: 
1. Justin Bieber — 27 per cent 
2. Kim Kardashian — 20.7 per cent 
3. Kanye West — 10.9 per cent 
4. Miley Cyrus — 9 per cent 
5. Caitlyn Jenner — 6.4 per cent 
Worst Aussie travel companions: 
1. Kyle Sandilands — 23.4 per cent 
2. Shane Warne — 8.2 per cent 
3. Lara Bingle — 6.7 per cent 
4. Karl Stefanovic — 5.9 per cent 
5. Nick Kyrgios — 5.6 per cent 
* The research was conducted online by Pure Profile through a national sample of over 1000 Australian residents over the age of 18. The interviews were conducted from August 7-10.
